mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT(prod_enddate, prod_writer, prod_name, prod_price, prod_count, prod_discount, prod_purchase_yn, prod_content, prod_comment ) values(#{prod_enddate}, #{prod_writer}, #{prod_name}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_count}, #{prod_discount}, #{prod_purchase_yn}, #{prod_content}, #{prod_comment} )
mapper.select:
select * from PRODUCT where prod_writer = #{user_id}
and date_format(prod_enddate, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{cri.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(prod_enddate, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{cri.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and prod_name like concat('%', #{cri.searchName}, '%')
and prod_content like concat('%', #{cri.searchContent} , '%')
order by
prod_price asc,
prod_price desc,
prod_id desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.amount}

select count(*) as total from PRODUCT where prod_writer = #{user_id}
and date_format(prod_enddate, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{cri.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(prod_enddate, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{cri.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and prod_name like concat('%', #{cri.searchName}, '%')
and prod_content like concat('%', #{cri.searchContent} , '%')
